name: Wish That I Could Be Human
name_original: Wish That I Could Be Human
description:
Made for GMC Jam 12 where the theme was "Evolution" and the handicap was "Must feature a train in some way that affects the gameplay".

Poika is a lost little boy in a colourless, dreary world where people are always horrible to each other. Poika aims to blow away the crippling sadness of his world and become human by performing acts of kindness for the other inhabitants of the spirit world.

Bonus: Download includes my other entry to GMC Jam 12, the joke game "Jam Battle Shooter" where you get to shoot me and my former housemates in our silly cartoon faces.
